person.name: Hussain
person.story: I met Hussain as my tour guide during a souq tour in Doha. He has been living in Qatar for 11 years. He used to work as a civil engineer but left the profession due to a mental illness. Now, he is happy working in what he truly loves.

advice.text: The simple fact of being alive is amazing, and we should be grateful for it, enjoy life, and always try to make others' lives better.

person.name: Louise
person.story: I met Louise during a 4x4 desert tour in Doha. She is a South African woman who has traveled extensively. She is as a travel agent and has explored many parts of the world. She was in Doha for four days before continuing her journey to the UK.

advice.text: Travel more, keep collecting memories. It's always worth the money.

person.name: Deepak Kumar
person.story: I met Deepak while diving and then went to Lemon Drop restaurant to have dinner together. He explained to me what yoga really means and we had a great talk about spirituality. He's 48 years old, lives in Goa, India, and was born in India. He's quite a traveller and has yoga instructor centers in Goa and one in Ubud, Indonesia.

advice.text: Life is a single player game

person.name: Paloma
person.story: Paloma was my diving instructor during all my dives in Maldives. She's from Madrid and used to be a dentist but got tired of that life. She moved to Australia for a while before ending up in Rasdhoo working as a diving instructor. She's 33 years old and has traveled extensively around the world. We had dinner together a couple of times and talked about life.

advice.text: Don't rush, enjoy the moment, learn to say no
